name: filter-for-heavy-vehicle-checking-stations;issue-lt-210-map-view-regression-browser-chrome-context-chrome-feature-lt23-map-view-lt-22-map-feature-panel-capability-lt-23-map-view

tags.name: LT 23 Map View/LT-22 Map Feature Panel

title: Filter for Heavy Vehicle Checking stations

testSteps.description: Given I am at the LiveTraffic Website
Then I see "Heavy Vehicle Safety Stations" filter is "disable" by default
And I enable "Heavy Vehicle Safety Stations" filter
When I navigate to Heavy Vehicle Safety Station page "d3e2777-2"
When I choose Hide map options

Then I should see below Heavy Vehicle Safety Station info
| Heavy_Vehicle_Safety_Station_info |
| Bell, Bells Line Of Road |
| 123kms west of Sydney, 20kms east of Lithgow. |
| Westbound traffic must cross the eastbound lane to enter thechecking station. |
| Visit Heavy Vehicles |
